data.title: First U. S. edition, expanded
data.meta_description: Sauk City, WI: Arkham House: Publishers, 1949. Octavo, cloth. First U. S. edition, expanded. 3062 copies printed. Includes the contents of THE NEW GODS LEAD 1932 plus two stories first collected here and a new 2-page author's foreword. Former owner's bookplate affixed to front paste down, lower right front corner bumped, a fine copy in a fine dust jacket with no tanning. 25665 . Item
data.text:
THE THRONE OF SATURN.

Wright, S[ydney] Fowler.

Sauk City, WI: Arkham House: Publishers, 1949. Octavo, cloth. First U. S. edition, expanded. 3062 copies printed. Includes the contents of THE NEW GODS LEAD (1932) plus two stories first collected here and a new 2-page author's "foreword." Former owner's bookplate affixed to front paste down, lower right front corner bumped, a fine copy in a fine dust jacket with no tanning. (25665). Item #25665
